title: Lucario

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Close Combat** - Deal a Powerful attack to someone. Your defense is reduced to Vulnerable for the night.
**Swords Dance** - Your attack level is raised by one for each of your other abilities.
**Extreme Speed** - Deal a Basic attack to someone. Bypasses protective effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Inner Focus** - Roleblock and Prevention Immunity. Your abilities cannot be neutralized.
**Justified** - If you are attacked, your attack level is permanently raised by one stage.

desc:
Post 2562
*Lucario can now read the auras of those around it. It revels in sensing the fear of its foes.*
